name: OwnedUpgradeabilityProxy
description: OwnedUpgradeabilityProxy. This contract combines an upgradeability proxy with basic authorization control functionalities.

eventDecorators.name: NewPendingOwner
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: ProxyOwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: Upgraded
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

functionDecorators.name: claimProxyOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the pendingOwner to claim ownership of the proxy.

functionDecorators.name: pendingProxyOwner
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the owner.

returnDecorators.name: pendingOwner
returnDecorators.description: the address of the pending owner.

functionDecorators.name: proxyOwner
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferProxyOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner. changes the pending owner to newOwner. But doesn't actually transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

functionDecorators.name: upgradeTo
functionDecorators.description: Allows the proxy owner to upgrade the current version of the proxy.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: representing the address of the new implementation to be set.
